# Functions in R

- Creating custom functions in R
- Example: Rolling dice

```{{r}}
sumdice <- function(n) {{
    k <- sample(1:6, size=n, replace=TRUE)
    return(sum(k))
}}
sumdice(2)
```

- Expectation from rolling 100 dice
```{{r}}
a <- sumdice(100)
a / 100
```

# Data Structures: Arrays, Data Frames, and Lists

- Introduction to vectors, matrices, and lists

```{{r}}
# Creating vectors and matrices
x <- c(1, 2, 3, 4)
matrix_x <- matrix(x, nrow=2, ncol=2)
print(matrix_x)
```

- Data frames using the `iris` dataset
```{{r}}
data(iris)
summary(iris)
```

# Table: Comparison of Data Structures

<style>
table { font-size: 0.75em; }
</style>

| Type       | Definition                               | Example                   |
|------------|------------------------------------------|---------------------------|
| Vector     | 1D array of elements                     | `x <- c(1, 2, 3)`         |
| Matrix     | 2D array, same data type                 | `matrix(1:4, nrow=2)`     |
| Data Frame | 2D array, different data types           | `data(iris)`              |
| List       | Collection of objects (any type)         | `list(a=1, b="hello")`    |

# Graphics in R

- Basic plotting functions

```{{r}}
plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Petal.Length)
```

- Visualization with histograms
```{{r}}
hist(iris$Sepal.Length, main="Histogram of Sepal Length", xlab="Sepal Length", col="lightblue", border="black")
```

# Advanced Visualizations

- Scatter plot with regression line
```{{r}}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| code-line-numbers: "|1|2"
plot(iris$Sepal.Length, iris$Petal.Length)
abline(lm(Petal.Length ~ Sepal.Length, data=iris), col="red")
```

- Boxplot for data visualization
```{{r}}
boxplot(iris$Sepal.Length ~ iris$Species, main="Sepal Length by Species", xlab="Species", ylab="Sepal Length", col="lightgreen")
```

# Introduction to ggplot2

- Visualizing using `ggplot2`

::: panel-tabset
## Code

```{{r}}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length, y=Petal.Length)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, color="blue") + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(title="Sepal vs Petal Length in Iris Dataset", x="Sepal Length", y="Petal Length")
```
